constituent: longing, valley, eight, umbrella, mouth, lack, yawn
myStory: kéo dài. tham lam. đam mê. mong muốn. thuộc về. kế tiếp thung lũng.
readingExamples: 欲しい (ほ.しい), 欲する (ほっ.する)
words:
意欲(いよく): will, desire, ambition
欲深い(よくふかい): greedy
欲望(よくぼう): desire, appetite
食欲(しょくよく): appetite (for food)
欲張り(よくばり): avarice, covetousness, greed
欲しい(ほしい): wanted, wished for, in need of, desired
